sys_variable_value.value: Your Order is Ready to be Picked Up from Meal Connections!

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello, Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name!

 

Your order is ready to be picked up at Meal Connections HQ.

Your order number is: Trigger➛...➛Number. Please pick up your order before the end of Trigger➛...➛Date Ordered.

 

Thank you for helping reduce waste! Your conscious effort keeps the world cleaner every single day.

Hello Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name,

 

We apologize for the inconvenience. Your order Trigger➛...➛Number has been canceled due to unforseen circumstances.

 

For inquiries about this order, please provide the order number when contacting Meal Connections via phone at (111) 111-1111. Our hours are 8 am - 5 pm CT. If we missed your call, please lookout for a voicemail.

sys_variable_value.value: Thank You for Picking Up Your Meal Connections Order!

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello, Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name!

 

Thank you for picking up order Trigger➛...➛Number at Meal Connections HQ.

 

Thank you for helping reduce waste! Your conscious effort keeps the world cleaner every single day.

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time
